'''Beta 1.19.10.22''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.19.10.22''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the third beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.10]], released on June 8, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/6757843469453|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.10.22|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=June 8, 2022}}</ref> which added allay duplication, brought more parity from {{JE}}, and fixed bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Flowered Azalea Leaves]]'''
* Renamed to "Flowering Azalea Leaves" to match {{JE}}.

'''[[Lapis Lazuli Block]]'''
* Renamed to "Block of Lapis Lazuli" to match [[Java Edition]].

=== Items ===
'''[[Goat Horn]]'''
* Changed "Feel" sound to match {{JE}}.
* Renamed "Resist" sound variant to "Dream".

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Allay]]s'''
* Can now dance when a jukebox is playing.
* If an allay is given an [[amethyst shard]] while dancing, it can "duplicate", creating another allay.

== Fixes==
'''Spectator Mode (Experimental)'''
* While in Spectator Mode, actors in other chunks are no longer culled away

'''Allay'''
* Allays can now follow players through Nether portals ({{bug|MCPE-155678}})

'''Deep Dark'''
* Amethyst Clusters are no longer destroyed if attached to a Sculk Sensor

'''Sculk Shrieker'''
* Sculk Shrieker particles are now correctly rendered from behind ({{bug|MCPE-153591}})

'''Sculk Catalyst'''
* When a mob dies in proximity of multiple Sculk Catalysts, only the closest one will bloom
* The "It Spreads" achievement is no longer unlocked when a Sculk Catalysts blooms after the death of a mob which carries no XP

'''Warden'''
* No more graphical artifacts from the Warden emerge or dig particle effect ({{bug|MCPE-153580}})

'''Frog'''
* Frogs no longer lay Frogspawn on shallow, flowing water ({{bug|MCPE-152559}})

'''Gameplay'''
* Fixed issues with mobs disappearing after going through Nether portals ({{bug|MCPE-155678}})
* Resistance effect is no longer one level weaker than it should be ({{bug|MCPE-156012}})
* Haste I will now properly increase the player's mining speed ({{bug|MCPE-102237}})
* Conduit Power I now grants the effect of Haste I instead of Haste II
* Container entities like Boat with Chest can now be opened on mobile devices without crouching if all the seats are occupied

'''Blocks'''
* Cut Copper Slab and its variants can now be placed on the top half of a block on the first attempt ({{bug|MCPE-154302}})

'''Commands'''
* Pillagers and Vindicator Captains spawned with commands are once again hostile by default ({{bug|MCPE-116971}})

'''General'''
* Ensured content errors are not ignored when loading entity JSON schemas with invalid value types for following fields: The "Runtime_Identifier", "Is_Spawnable" and "Is_Summonable" fields for "description", the "component_groups" field and the "event" field for "events" ({{bug|MCPE-151381}})
* Fixed an issue where new users given Operator permissions by default were not able to use operator commands
* Fixed an issue where worlds that give Operator permissions to new users only give Member permissions

'''Mobile Controls'''
* Updated icon for Interact Button

'''Graphical'''
* Fog setting with negative fog start will no longer cause flame on player model in UI get tainted by fog color
* “particles_blend” material is no longer culled in RenderDragon

'''Items'''
* Fixed an issue where Carved Pumpkins launched from Dispensers weren't equipping to nearby mobs

'''Mobs'''
* Parrots once again are poisoned by Cookies ({{bug|MCPE-151671}})

'''Player'''
* The player no longer endlessly jumps after entering a boat while holding down the jump button ({{bug|MCPE-155774}})

'''Stability and Performance'''
* Fixed a crash that could occur if a mob has the flocking component</onlyinclude>
